sect2.title: Installation of Kbd
sect2.para: Kbd doesn't install some of its utilities (setlogcons, setvesablank and getunimap) by default. The kbd patch enables the compilation of these utilities.
Apply the patch by running the following command:
And finish off installing the package:

sect2.title: Command explanations
sect2.para: patch -Np1 -i ../kbd-&kbd-patch-version;.patch: This patch changes a Makefile so some utilities that are not installed by default (setlogcons, setvesablank and getunimap) are installed.
